subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 20 shots in a win over Detroit in the Devils’ last game before Wednesday’s trade deadline, when they could try to move Brodeur, their longtime star who has become an occasional backup.
snippet: Martin Brodeur stopped 20 shots in a win over Detroit in the Devils’ last game before Wednesday’s trade deadline, when they could try to move Brodeur, their longtime star who has become an occasional backup.
